sentences.sContent: The company’s financial difficulties have deterred potential investors.
sentences.sCn: 该公司的财务困境令潜在的投资者望而却步。

remMethod.val: de + ter(=terr吓唬) → 威慑， 吓住

trans.tranCn: 威慑， 吓住； 阻止
trans.tranOther: to stop someone from doing something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results
